titles.title: In Moments Like These, I Sing Out A Song

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In moments like these, I sing out a song,
I sing out a love song to Jesus.
In moments like these, I lift up my hands,
I lift up my hands to the Lord.
Singing, I love You Lord. (3x)
I love You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
En momentos asi levanto mi voz
Levanto mis manos a Cristo
En momentos asi levanto mi voz

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Levanto mis manos a El.
Cuanto te amo Dios.(3x)
Dios te amo
